last_episode_to_air.name: Trail Blazers
last_episode_to_air.overview: Turtleman hears the 'call of the wild' and heads deep into the woods with Neal James. They take on gnarly gar, a hive of honeybees, and a narrow cavern passage to find a Forgotten Valley deep in the way-backwoods Turtleman hasn’t seen in years.

name: Call of the Wildman
overview: Call of the Wildman is an American reality television following the exploits of Kentucky woodsman Ernie Brown, Jr., nicknamed "The Turtleman". Aided by his friend, Neal James, and his dog, Lolly, Brown operates a nuisance animal removal business, catching the animals without harming them and releasing them back into the wild. The series is primarily filmed near Brown's Lebanon, Kentucky, home.

episodes.name: Dirty Jobs
episodes.overview: In the series premiere, a farmers cows are getting attacked in a nearby cooling pond and emerge with missing udders; the culprits: snapping turtles. Ernie is happy to jump in but the pond is overflowing with manure.

episodes.name: Groundhog Day
episodes.overview: The turtle man meets his match against his bare hand tactics- a skunk. Hiding under layers upon layers of clothes is his only defense.

episodes.name: Possum Poltergeist
episodes.overview: When a local radio host challenges Turtleman to venture deep into the haunted woods of Kentucky and evict a school of venomous reptiles and rabid rodents, he is sent on a wild adventure to protect his Blue Grass name and legend.

episodes.name: The Turtles of Alcatraz Pond
episodes.overview: Turtleman receives news that one of his top rescue ponds is scheduled to be bulldozed in a matter of hours. But this isn't just any rescue pond. Nicknamed "Alcatraz," it's where he has released the 12 most ferocious snapping turtles he's ever encountered.

episodes.name: Fort Rattlesnake
episodes.overview: Turtleman spots a vicious raccoon at an old trading post and must remove the creature without damaging the historic structure. It's man vs. beast and whoever makes the first mistake will decide the future of one of the last standing stores of its kind.

episodes.name: Turtle Boot Camp
episodes.overview: A farmer's hens are mysteriously disappearing from his chicken coop, and Turtleman's called in to catch the mysterious predator.

episodes.name: Trapped Underground
episodes.overview: Turtleman races against the clock to save a calf that's fallen down a deep sinkhole and is in distress. Something is lurking in the Wilkins family pond — an animal so big, it broke the line Mrs. Wilkins set to trap it.

episodes.name: The Snake Pit
episodes.overview: Turtleman hears of a job in North Carolina — a man's duck pond is being terrorized by turtles. Just a routine job until he finds out this call has come from David Ragan, one of the biggest stars of Turtleman's favorite sport: NASCAR.

episodes.name: Nightmare at Poachers Pond
episodes.overview: Turtleman and his crew stage a daring night rescue to save turtles threatened by a band of poachers. Things don't get much brighter when a nuisance call requires Turtleman to descend 30 feet into an underground spring to remove a mysterious animal.

episodes.name: The Bayou Beast
episodes.overview: Backwoods meets the bayou when Turtleman and Neal take a road trip down to Louisiana to investigate a mysterious predator locals call the "Beast of the Bayou." Armadillos burrows are destroying the foundation of a family's home.

episodes.name: Danger in the Distillery
episodes.overview: A family of possums invades a historic Kentucky bourbon distillery and Ernie might be in danger. Later, turkeys create chaos in a corn maze by attacking kids.

episodes.name: Dilapidated Death Trap
episodes.overview: Ernie and his team are asked to clear a wide variety of critters out of an abandon house; a families house is overrun with more rats then they thought.

episodes.name: Miner Threat
episodes.overview: Turtleman's got a date with a country critter that's got a taste for chewing the wooden support beams of a rural coalmine. Then, Turtleman must save the day after a tornado tears through the countryside, releasing lethal chemicals into a turtle pond.

episodes.name: Killer at Shaker Village
episodes.overview: Kentucky's Shaker Village is home to a bird sanctuary, but this church has got a new mystery member, and it's practicing blood sacrifice! Then, signs of a home invasion are becoming too much for one family to ignore, and Turtleman is their only hope.

episodes.name: Santa Claws
episodes.overview: A hedgehog at a local petting zoo turns up dead, with only a pair of tooth marks left as evidence. Then, local realtors are planning an open house for a historic Kentucky mansion when a critter with a taste for pastries undermines their selling attempts.

episodes.name: Beehive Massacre
episodes.overview: A bachelor auction has a treat for its bidders when Turtleman shows up as the prize of the party. Three ladies pool their money to win a date with the Turtleman, and he meets them for a date at one of his favorite haunts: a pond full of snapping turtles!

episodes.name: Speedway Demons
episodes.overview: Turtleman and his team go to Kentucky's Ponderosa Speedway, where they round up raccoons, groundhogs and an opossum. Later, an escaped boa constrictor requires Turtleman's immediate attention.

episodes.name: Hell Hog
episodes.overview: Turtleman's back in New Orleans and teaming up with John "Hogman" Schmidt. Wild hogs are posing a direct threat to a real estate developer's property. Then, shrimper Big Sexy's livelihood is at stake when a pack of muskrats prevent him from setting sail.

episodes.name: French Quarter Coyote
episodes.overview: Turtleman heads south to New Orleans to help innocent civilians in danger where a coyote is on the loose. He's then out to stop an invasive species destroying the Louisiana swampland in Baton Rouge.

episodes.name: Baby Mama Drama
episodes.overview: Turtleman must capture a critter he's never seen before! At a community pool, unwanted swimmers are keeping kids from cooling off on a hot summer day, and it's up to Turtleman to snatch these slithering swimmers!

episodes.name: Jaws of Hell
episodes.overview: The Turtle Team is going back to college to clean up a host of gnarly critters that have moved into a frat house. A snapping turtle attacks a local preacher's congregants during a baptism in a pond, and the ceremony can't resume without Turtleman's help.

episodes.name: Trailer Park Stink Bomb
episodes.overview: A beaver dam threatens erosion and flooding to a farm, while a pesky beaver drags the Turtle team through the mud. Local trailer park residents flee after a putrid odor persists for several days. The source is the vermin Turtleman hates most -- a skunk!

episodes.name: Night of the Digging Dead
episodes.overview: A local cemetery is being disrespected by a canine whose cunning is matched only by its beauty. An emu farmer has lost one of his prized birds and despite no experience with these exotic animals, Turtleman agrees to find it.

episodes.name: Sawmill Slasher
episodes.overview: Turtle Team Jake's wood-supplier is forced to shut down after a mysterious critter chews through the sawmill's wiring. Turtleman makes a last-ditch effort to clear the studio of snakes before a Kentucky bluegrass legend arrives for his instrument.

episodes.name: Tee'd Off Turtles
episodes.overview: A winery needs Turtleman's help with invasive pests before its business withers on the vine; menacing snapping turtles are keeping golfers from retrieving their balls from a pond.

episodes.name: Pig Wallow Predator
episodes.overview: Turtleman shows some Kentucky pride when he's called to rescue a stable of horses from a potentially venomous snake. At a local swine farmer's watering hole, a drift of hogs and a pair of snapping turtles are careening on a mutual path toward destruction.

episodes.name: Killer in the Cavern
episodes.overview: Rabbits are being killed on a farm by a nocturnal predator; a drive-in theater is threatened by an unidentified animal.

episodes.name: Fairground Fiasco
episodes.overview: A carnival's infestation problems could jeopardize the traveling show; an unseen critter is digging up a family's yard, not far from a children's playground.

episodes.name: Mama Llama Drama
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, a critter is an uninvited guest at a community swimming pool, and the local kids are afraid to go in the water.

episodes.name: All Skunked Up
episodes.overview: An unknown threat slaughters calves on a cattle ranch; a skunk lets a local sculptor know what it thinks about his art.

episodes.name: Hook, Line and Snapper
episodes.overview: A feed store is being robbed by a hungry critter; Turtleman helps his mom relocate snapping turtles from her pond.

episodes.name: Cat Killer
episodes.overview: Turtleman helps a local lady whose cats are disappearing. He must wrangle and relocate the cats, except for one to lure in the predator! Then, Turtleman is asked to capture foul smelling critters before they spray more kids at a local playground.

episodes.name: Deer Destruction
episodes.overview: After a consignment-store window is broken, Turtleman must safely remove the furry culprit from inside. Meanwhile, a critter that's been living in a hot tub has to go before the owner's party can begin.

episodes.name: Freddy Critter's Revenge
episodes.overview: A woman's cats are disappearing, so Turtleman must catch and relocate them but also find a way to lure the predator out in the open. Meanwhile, foul-smelling critters are spoiling the fun for kids at a playground.

episodes.name: 12 Angry Pigeons
episodes.overview: Turtleman must remove the flock from a jobsite where workers are cleaning up bird feces. Then, a caretaker finds a critter living under her log cabin, and Turtleman must relocate it before the foundation collapses!

episodes.name: Savage Stowaways
episodes.overview: Critters on a houseboat must be removed before it's closed for the winter; snapping turtles have to be relocated from a distillery before they force production to be stalled.

episodes.name: Major League Menace
episodes.overview: A critter in a baseball park must be removed before the season begins; a furry freeloader is an uninvited guest at a bed-and-breakfast.

episodes.name: Lured into Danger
episodes.overview: The team go fishing for a break from work, but first must deal with a critter that's lurking near a home.

episodes.name: Best Little Boar House in Texas
episodes.overview: The team go to Texas, where a rattlesnake must be relocated before it takes over a business; and a barbecue restaurant is plagued by a critter that keeps getting into the garbage cans.

episodes.name: Bat Hair Day
episodes.overview: Turtleman and Neal risk their lives to save a critter trapped in a cave; unwanted animals find a new home in a hair salon.

episodes.name: Wild Receiver
episodes.overview: A stolen mascot from a rival football team must be tamed;  Team Turtle works to relocate an alligator that wandered into a residential area.

episodes.name: Ernie le'Pew
episodes.overview: A farmer's losing his goats to a ferocious critter that Turtleman suspects is a large cat; show dogs are plagued by a skunk.

episodes.name: Lone Stars and Stripes
episodes.overview: A film set is being damaged by a critter that's digging holes, so Turtleman must remove it before production begins; a zebra goes missing from a farm.

episodes.name: River Monster Mystery
episodes.overview: A critter that digs holes is keeping a farmer from training his bull; snapping turtles are preventing people from tubing down a river, so Turtleman sets out to relocate them so the fun can resume.

episodes.name: The Bull and the Beautiful
episodes.overview: A farmer's bull gets loose, and Turtleman must find it before it scares her neighbor's cattle. Meanwhile, critters disrupt a nightly paranormal tour at a former sanatorium in Louisville.

episodes.name: Fur for the Course
episodes.overview: A pet wallaby disappears, so Turtleman must find it and return it to safety; a miniature golf course is plagued by critters that are leaving their droppings all over the place.

episodes.name: Don't Leave It to Beaver
episodes.overview: A critter in a warehouse must be relocated so work can resume; an animal is taking down Christmas trees and must be caught.

episodes.name: Get Otter My Pond
episodes.overview: A prized peacock goes missing from a Renaissance fair; an unseen critter is eating fish at a lake.

episodes.name: Apocalypse Meow
episodes.overview: A vicious critter is terrorizing horses at a farm, so Turtleman sets a trap to catch it; Jake's race cars need protection from a troublesome animal.

episodes.name: Mudzilla Attacks
episodes.overview: Goats are being attacked by a vicious animal on a woman's farm; a critter is stuck in the mud in a park for off-road vehicles.

episodes.name: Halloween Spooktacular
episodes.overview: Turtleman's friend gets lost in the woods while looking for Bigfoot on the night before Halloween; a haunted-forest attraction is plagued by a pair of menacing critters.

episodes.name: Smokey and the Bandit
episodes.overview: A cigar warehouse is plagued by an animal that's munching on an expensive product; the owner of a storage facility keeps hearing a critter in one of his units.

episodes.name: Unarmed and Dangerous
episodes.overview: A critter at a paintball park has Team Turtle dodging colored projectiles to catch it; a fireworks store has some unwelcome intruders.

episodes.name: The Crittersburg Address
episodes.overview: Newlyweds need help when they hear a menacing rattle in their RV; Turtleman responds to a critter call at a historic manor that was once visited by Abraham Lincoln.

episodes.name: Snake Town Shakedown
episodes.overview: A worm farm is threatened by a hungry critter; Neal's grandfather's house has a snake problem in the basement.

episodes.name: Chaos in Critter Cavern
episodes.overview: A 12-foot Burmese python has been slithering around a woman's home for years; Turtleman and Neal investigate reports of a critter inside the walls of a man's house.

episodes.name: Swine Dining
episodes.overview: A farmer's piglet is missing, so Turtleman sets a trap to catch a carnivorous critter; the owner of a bowling alley thinks there's a dead animal on the premises, but an investigation reveals it's still very much alive.

episodes.name: Turtleman Takes Manhattan
episodes.overview: Turtleman and Neal go to New York City, where they stay in a swanky hotel, meet the cast of Broadway's "Annie," visit an art gallery and eat at Katz's Deli, but their most important mission is to buy a Christmas present for Turtleman's mother.

episodes.name: Phantom Menace
episodes.overview: Turtleman ventures into the woods with "Finding Bigfoot" team members Bobo and Ranae. Meanwhile, a man needs a hand with a burrowing creature; and a 6-year-old boy keeps hearing an animal in his room at night.

episodes.name: Snap 'n' Splash
episodes.overview: Critters are gnawing on expensive items in an antique store; an animal is trapped in a water park's filtration system.

episodes.name: Bear Necessities
episodes.overview: The rest of the team has to help out a realtor who has a critter preventing him from selling a house, because Turtleman is down for the count with the flu.

episodes.name: Headless Horror
episodes.overview: Neither the chickens nor the eggs are safe from a predator that's been helping itself to the residents of Lindsey's chicken coop. Then, Turtleman must catch a tree-chomping critter that's wreaking havoc on a vacation community by the Red River Gorge.

episodes.name: Kneel Before Sod
episodes.overview: Turtleman's former teacher calls about a critter that's digging tunnels under his barn. Later, Turtleman enters a dance contest at the Daniel Boone Festival.

episodes.name: Troll in the Coal
episodes.overview: Turtleman goes to Montana, where he searches for a bison calf that was scared by a wildfire. Also: A charcoal manufacturer complains about an animal that's ruining his product.

episodes.name: Ghost Town Gold Rush
episodes.overview: More adventures in Montana include ridding a couple's campgrounds of nocturnal nuisances that are wreaking havoc on the properties.

episodes.name: Fang Nabbit!
episodes.overview: Squirrel arrives in Montana just in time to help out at a woman's ranch, where a critter has been digging tunnels all over her land and under her stables. Meanwhile, Turtleman confronts a ferocious animal that's been eating a woman's rabbits.

episodes.name: Tough Cookies
episodes.overview: Turtleman must catch a critter that’s threatening a water source on Gary’s farm. Then, Cole’s new backwoods skills are put to the test when she joins Team Turtle on a call. Will the team gain a new member?

episodes.name: Trail Blazers
episodes.overview: Turtleman hears the 'call of the wild' and heads deep into the woods with Neal James. They take on gnarly gar, a hive of honeybees, and a narrow cavern passage to find a Forgotten Valley deep in the way-backwoods Turtleman hasn’t seen in years.
